sentences.en: The broker will get 5% if he finds a purchaser.
sentences.cn: 这个中间人如果找到一个买主就将提成5%。

sentences.en: If a purchaser fails to punch in the correct PIN at the checkout, the transaction gets rejected.
sentences.cn: 如果购买者未能在结帐时输入正确的 PIN 码，交易将被拒绝。

sentences.en: Overall between 30% and 50% of what has been bought in developed countries is thrown away by the purchaser.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，在发达国家购买的东西有30%到50%被购买者扔掉了。
